mvsusieR

Setup

To automatically retrieve and install the latest version of the R package from this repository, run

remotes::install_github("stephenslab/mvsusieR")

Quick Start

Here is a quick document to show mvsusieR in action. For more documentation and examples please visit: https://stephenslab.github.io/mvsusieR

Developer notes

  • When any changes are made to roxygen2 markup, simply run devtools::document() to update package NAMESPACE and documentation files.

  • To install and test the package, run the following commands in the shell:

    VERSION=`grep Version DESCRIPTION | awk '{print $2}'`
R CMD build --resave-data --no-build-vignettes mvsusieR
R CMD INSTALL mvsusieR_$VERSION.tar.gz
R CMD check --as-cran --ignore-vignettes mvsusieR_$VERSION.tar.gz

  • Run pkgdown::build_site(lazy = TRUE,examples = FALSE) to build the website.
